creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his family and friends
description: teapot, silver; curved oval body with flat hinged lid and tapered straight spout; engraved with rosette and ribbon bands on side and lid; diamond cartouche engraved on each side, one with initials EM in monogram; wooden handle with plain sockets; fully marked underside

title: Teapot
